name: Renai X Royale: Love's a Battle
storyline:
Meet Komachi Hirotaka, your typical high school slacker.
His daily routine? Getting roasted by underclassmen, unsuccessfully flirting with the student council president, and fanboying over idols. Life's good when you're flying under the radar, right?

Wrong. Enter Hanamaru Mari, the new transfer student, who drops a bombshell:

"Komachi Hirotaka, I'm head over heels for you! Will you be my boyfriend?"

Talk about a plot twist! This out-of-the-blue confession doesn't just ruffle a few feathers—it unleashes a long-dormant tsunami of romantic rivalry.

Suddenly, Hirotaka finds himself at the center of a love hurricane he never saw coming:

- One girl blows her top: "Why are you getting cozy with some rando when I've been here all along? Have you forgotten about me already!?"
- His devoted junior turns up the heat: "Senpai... you know Renna would do anything for you, right? Anything..."
- Even his sister throws her hat in the ring: "Nii-san, is it because of these female vultures swarming around you that's keeping you from loving me?"

Poor, clueless Hirotaka remains blissfully unaware as these ladies duke it out in a no-holds-barred battle royale of love. It's messy, it's a tad ridiculous, but boy, do they mean business!

Who'll come out on top in this romantic free-for-all? Will Cupid's arrow find its mark, or will it trigger a comedy of errors? Buckle up, folks—this rollercoaster of romance is just leaving the station!
summary: I, transfer student Hanamaru Mari, love you, Komachi Hiro-kun! Please go out with me! Our protag, Komachi Hirotaka. Every day, he goes through the motions-- dodging his cunning underclassman's advances, accidentally hitting on the student council president, and chasing idols.
